Privilege Definitions

Three tables are included for reference:

  • Base Privileges - the base privileges, the actions they enable, and the desktop client command or dialog box fields they enable. Refer to the Serena ChangeMan Version Manager Command-Line Reference Guide for information about which commands in the command-line interface the privileges enable.

  • Composite Privileges - the composite privileges and the base privileges that comprise them. This table first lists the command-line interface name and then the desktop client name for each privilege. Refer to the base privileges table for a definition of each base privilege.

  • Default Privilege Sets - the default privilege sets that Version Manager provides and the base privileges, composite privileges, and other privilege sets that provide the definition of the default privilege sets.
